channel.title: 1Password - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in 1Password on Today I Learnt...

item.title: The keyboard shortcut for grabbing a MFA code in 1PW
item.description: After opening the 1Password mini window (with cmd + option + \), select the item you want and hit shift + ctrl + cmd + c to copy the MFA code to your clipboard. This compliments shift + cmd + c, which copies the password.
